quote: Laughing at the universe liberated my life. I escape its weight by laughing. I refuse any intellectual translations of this laughter, since my slavery would commence from that point on.
quote_letters: LAUGHING AT THE UNIVERSE LIBERATED MY LIFE I ESCAPE ITS WEIGHT BY LAUGHING I REFUSE ANY INTELLECTUAL TRANSLATIONS OF THIS LAUGHTER SINCE MY SLAVERY WOULD COMMENCE FROM THAT POINT ON
